posts.text: å†™ä¸€äº›è§‰å¾—èƒ½ç”¨ä¸Šçš„C++ä»£ç ï¼š å°†æ–‡æœ¬çš„æ•°å­—è¯»æˆæ•°ç»„ï¼š #include<iostream> #include<fstream> using namespace std; int main() { const int txtRow = 201; const int txtColumn = 8; float txtData[txtRow][txtColumn]; ifstream infile; infile.open("C:\\APP\\C\\Project2\\æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®.txt"); for (int i = 0; i < txtRow; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < txtColumn; j++) { infile >> txtData[i][j]; } } infile.close(); return 0; } å°†æ–‡æœ¬çš„æ•°å­—è¯»æˆçŸ©é˜µï¼Œéœ€è¦ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åº“Eigenã€‚ #include<iostream> #include<Eigen/Dense> #include<fstream> #include<cmath> using namespace std; using namespace Eigen; MatrixXd ReadData(istream& data, int a, int b) { MatrixXd m_matrix(a, b); for (int i = 0; i < a; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < b; j++) { data >> m_matrix(i,j); } } return m_matrix; } int main() { const int row = 201; const int column = 8; ifstream infile("C:\\APP\\C\\Project2\\æµ‹è¯•æ•°æ®.txt", ios::in); if (!infile) { return 0; } MatrixXd m_matrix = ReadData(infile, row, column); return 0; } å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼š #include<iostream> #include<vector> using namespace std; void display(vector<int> vec) { for (int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i) cout << vec[i] << ' '; cout << endl; } void swap(int& val1, int& val2) { int temp = val1; val1 = val2; val2 = temp; } void bubble_sort(vector<int>& vec) { for (int ix = 0; ix < vec.size(); ++ix) for (int jx = ix + 1; jx < vec.size(); ++jx) if (vec[ix] > vec[jx]) swap(vec[ix], vec[jx]); } int main() { int al[8] = { 2,56,4,5,13,7,1,24 }; vector<int> vec(al, al + 8); cout << "before sort: "; display(vec); bubble_sort(vec); cout << "after sort: "; display(vec); return 0; } å…³é”®åœ¨äºswap å’Œ bubble_sortæ—¶ï¼Œä¸ä»…è¦ä¼ å€¼ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¦ä¼ å€ï¼Œä¸ç„¶åªæ˜¯å…¶å€¼è¢«å¤åˆ¶äº†ä¸€ä»½ï¼Œæˆä¸ºäº†å‚æ•°çš„å±€éƒ¨æ€§å®šä¹‰ï¼Œå½“è¿è¡Œç»“æŸä¹Ÿå°±ä»â€œç¨‹åºå †æ ˆâ€é‡Œé‡Šæ”¾æ‰äº†ï¼Œå¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å…³è”èµ·æ¥ã€‚
